TextView.android:text: A unique feature in Bogmalo is a pet boarding and training academy founded by internationally awarded animal behaviourist Gautam Kari. Called Kari's K9 Kamp, this canine facility is set in a beautiful Portuguese style villa and is a cage-free and leash-free facility. It is ideal for people going on vacation as the premises is close to Dabolim Airport. Services include overnight pet boarding, dog daycare, dog training and pet products delivery.
